summary: Complete end-to-end testing of Discord Radio Bot hosting service. All backend APIs and frontend components working perfectly. German language interface properly implemented with 4 bots, 11 stations, and full functionality.
passed_tests: Backend API /api/bots returns 4 bots with proper data structure
Backend API /api/stations returns 11 stations with genres
Frontend Hero section with German title 'Dreh die Lautst√§rke auf'
Frontend Bot directory with 4 colored bot cards and working invite buttons
Frontend Station browser with 11 stations and functional search/filter
Frontend Commands section displaying all 10 slash commands
Frontend Stats footer showing all statistics correctly
Navigation links scroll to correct sections
Bot invite buttons have correct Discord URLs and are clickable
Copy functionality works for bot invitation URLs
Hero CTA buttons navigate to correct sections
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (5/5 endpoints), Frontend: 100% (all components and interactions)
